numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I looked closely at the graphs.
2. The National Football League has the lowest percentage of head coaches of color.
3. Major League Soccer has a higher percentage of head coaches of color than the National Football League.
5. The graph about the Women's National Basketball Association contains information from 2019.
6. I wonder why the number of head coaches of color is so small.
8. The graphs show that national sports are not inclusive enough.
9. A person prefers to join a sport if the sport has people like the person.
10. A person prefers not to join a sport if the sport does not have people like the person.
11. The graph shows a lack of diversity in the field.
